article_title: TRUMP TO REPLACE BELICHICK AS PATRIOTS' HEAD COACH
article_text:
About this blog

By Carlo Baldino

Carlo Baldino taught high school English in the Worcester public schools for many years. Following his retirement he won two first-place journalism awards given by the New England Press Association, one for educational coverage and the other for ...

article_metadata.description: When you first saw this headline, what did you think? Tell the truth, for a second you thought it might be a possibility, and a second after that you denounced it as utterly ridiculous. Why is it absurd? Because you wouldn't want your beloved New England Patriots to be under the command of a real [...]
